name: Park Rangers of The Undead
description:
Welcome To Brentwood National Park. You have been hired by The Company to rid the park of its nocturnal wildlife, which just happen to be ZOMBIES. As a retired Mercenary you are qualified to use any and all means at your disposal to achieve victory.


With many levels to play and many zombies to kill, tons of weapons to use this game is action packed for the whole family!

Combat:
Use 14 unique weapons with their own uses. From a simple pistol, to a minigun.

Building:
With 3 materials to build mazes, towers, and forts to repel the zombies and survive each night. There are limitless building options.


The Company will pay you money for every zombie you kill each night, use this money to buy Company provided ammo, better guns, and building materials. Unleash unmitigated destruction to remove the zombie threat once and for all!
